name: Mysterious Oasis
description:
I made this game in 2014 and she is a representative of the classic HOPA genre.
(there are games much better this, but this is my favorite and one of the complex projects)

In the near future...
A natural disaster rained down on the planet.
Chaos and devastation devoured the last sparkles of life.
However, there is a legend telling about a Mysterious Oasis.
It is possible that there might be a single chance to rise from the ashes.
You must search and find a way to reach the Oasis...
If it really exists...

- Advanced Mode option for challenging gameplay!
- Use your inventory to interact with each scene.
- Find the legendary Mysterious Oasis!
